Class Session

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server.ncf.Session
All Implemented Interfaces:
INotificationSession, java.lang.Runnable
public final class Session
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, INotificationSession

The session handles incoming client connections.

Constructor Detail

Session

protected Session(NCFHostingTechnology hostingPlugIn,
                  java.net.Socket socket)
           throws java.io.IOException
Constructor. Generates a new session object and starts a thread for receiving and processing incoming client messages.

Parameters:
hostingPlugIn - the creating publishing engine
socket - the socket of the client connection
Throws:
java.io.IOException - creating the reader / writer for messages fails or setting the read timeout fails

subscribeMethodResult

public void subscribeMethodResult(ServiceMethodSubscribeCommand message,
                                  MethodContract contract)
Handles client method subscriptions. Starts a new timer task that polls the result of the specified method.

Parameters:
message - the subscription method
contract - the method contract of the method to be subscribed

unsubscribeMethodResult

public void unsubscribeMethodResult(ServiceMethodSubscribeCommand message)
Removes a client method subscription. Stops the timer task that polls the method result.

Parameters:
message - the method to be unsubscribed

subscribe

public void subscribe(ServiceSubscribeCommand command)
Adds a subscription to the session.

Parameters:
command - the request message to be subscribed

unsubscribe

public boolean unsubscribe(java.lang.String publishedServiceName)
Removes a subscription from the session.

Parameters:
publishedServiceName - the published name of the service to be unsubscribed
Returns:
true, if unsubscription was successful
false, otherwise (not subscribed)

public java.lang.Object sendClientRequest(java.lang.String publishedServiceName,
                                          java.lang.String methodName,
                                          int timeout,
                                          java.lang.Object... parameters)
Description copied from interface: INotificationSession
Sends a request to all subscribed clients of the session and returns the response value.

Specified by:
sendClientRequest in interface INotificationSession
Parameters:
publishedServiceName - the published name of the service
methodName - the name of the notification method to be invoked on the client
timeout - timeout (in milliseconds)
parameters - parameters of the invoked notification method
Returns:
the response of the invocation of the client's notification method
